roleset.name: bear children

example.name: The meaning of this instance escapes me
example.text: Yet he knew the others were sleeping more soundly, now that they hadrenewed their contact with the matter that-1 *T*-1 had birthed them to sendthem riding high vacuum.
example.arg: to send them riding high vacuum
